alert.note: Alert for Dale; Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 10:28AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Dale, eastern Geneva and Houston Counties in southeastern Alabama, Jackson, northeastern Bay, northwestern Calhoun, Holmes and Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 1115 AM CDT... At 1028 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of De Funiak Springs to near Vernon to 18 miles northeast of Lynn Haven. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Vernon, Bonifay, Marianna, Chipley, Graceville, Dothan, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Newton, Webb, Pinckard, Bradford, Malone, Malvern and Rehobeth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
